channel.title: No class8.java?

item.title: No class8.java?
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

[quote=“Rs rebornz, post:9, topic:431079”]Do you not understand? whatever i do i get errors, this is my compiler when i post that in my itemdef.java

[/quote]

You are getting less errors as you start to rename correctly, continue renaming as I said…
See what I was doing in my last post? That’s not all that needs to be done, you have to do that for each line. I haven’t given you all the information since you need to research a bit yourself to find out what has been renamed to what…

Edit: I’m half asleep at the moment so forgive me if there are some mistakes with this but here you go…

itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[4]; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[4]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 57280; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[1] = 54503; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[2] = 54183; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[3] = 11200; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 9152; itemDef.originalModelColors[1] = 7104; itemDef.originalModelColors[2] = 7104; itemDef.originalModelColors[3] = 796; itemDef.modelID = 4; itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 500; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.anInt204 = 14; // itemDef.modelOffset1 = -6; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.anInt165 = 5; // itemDef.anInt200 = 5; // itemDef.anInt175 = -1; // itemDef.anInt197 = -1; // itemDef.name = "Donator Cape"; // made by xxxxxxx itemDef.description = "The cape worn by Donators -made xxxxxxx.".getBytes();

Read full topic

item.title: No class8.java?
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

I don’t think you understand, things have basically been renamed in your client.
E.g. class8 is now itemDef, etc.
^ Remember itemDef is with a LOWERCASE i (The class itself is named ItemDef with a capital though.)

I’ll do a few for you:

would become:

…

…

…

etc etc.
I’m not going to do all of these for you, since it’s 1:30am here (and you should do some research for yourself). But I hope you understand the concept now.

Read full topic

item.title: No class8.java?
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

[quote=“Rs rebornz, post:3, topic:431079”]tryed and got 26 error’s.
come on teamviewerplease?[/quote]
That would be because you are working with a refactored client, meaning that most methods, classes etc have been renamed. The code you are using is correspondent with the regular client.

E.g. class8 has been renamed to itemDef therefore…

would become…

and so on. However remember that some of those declarations have been renamed further so you’re going to have to do your own research to figure out what has become what.

Read full topic
